vsParam:
Let me see, according to this reference book,
this and that... ah, they must be added in order.

And I must pay attention to the materials'
quality and properties... Ah! I think it works!

Oh oh, Ayesha,
you are working hard in learning alchemy!

Uh-huh, I begin to understand this book.
It feels like that I become a real alchemist.

Hey hey. You have become an outstanding alchemist
a long time ago, aren't you?

Yes! [px] needs to work harder,
or else Ayesha will surpass you!

But, Ayesha, you are a pharmacist, right?
Why do you enjoy alchemy so much?
You must be hooked by alchemy!
Is this related to your sister?

Hehe, maybe I am. After all, it's fun to learn.
But that's not the only reason.

Yeah. You are right.
Alchemy is one of the leads to my younger sister.

A spectacled uncle once told me that,
there are two key factors for rescuing my younger sister...

Yes. I think he's an alchemist, too...
But I don't know much about him.

For some unknown reasons, I find his words trustworthy,
plus, there are no more clues.

One of the keys is "glowing flower".
And the other one is learning alchemy...

According to the spectacled uncle,
these two factors are connected.

So, the "glowing flower" has something to do with your
sister's missing and alchemy, right?

Yes. I believe so.
That's why alchemy is the only way for me.

Learning about alchemy,
will further my understanding of the "glowing flower"...

It clarifies a lot... who would know that
the leisurely Ayesha has such a clear mind...

Hee hee, you flatter me... Uh?
Are you sure it's a compliment?

Yes, of course!
Ayesha is soft on the outside and tough on the inside.

Hmm... I, I am not.
I just want to see my younger sister...

No. Many will just give up under such a circumstance.
So I think you are really amazing.

T, thanks!
I'll keep working hard!
